com.datapak.shopify_java_api.interfaces

Interface RefundInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RefundInterfaceImpl

    public interface RefundInterface
    Allows access to Shopify's Refund Interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jbrown

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Refund calculateRefund(Long order_id, Refund_Line_Item[] lineItems, Shipping shipping)
      Calculate refund transactions based on line items and shipping.
      Refund createRefund(Long order_id, Refund refund)
      Create a Refund for an existing Order.
      Refund getRefund(Long order_id, Long refund_id)
      Retrieve a specific refund for an Order
      Refund[] getRefunds(Long order_id)
      Retrieve a list of Refunds for an Order

    • Method Detail

      • getRefunds

        Refund[] getRefunds(Long order_id)
             throws ShopifyError
        Retrieve a list of Refunds for an Order
        Parameters:
        order_id - A Long object containing the order Id
        Returns:
        Refund[] containing A list of refunds for order
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order is not found or there is some issue

      • getRefund

        Refund getRefund(Long order_id,
                 Long refund_id)
          throws ShopifyError
        Retrieve a specific refund for an Order
        Parameters:
        order_id - A string containing the order Id
        refund_id - A string containing the id of the refund
        Returns:
        Refund object containing refund for the order
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order/refund is not found or there is some issue

      • createRefund

        Refund createRefund(Long order_id,
                    Refund refund)
             throws ShopifyError
        Create a Refund for an existing Order. It is highly suggested that you use calculateRefund to produce the transactions to submit.
        Parameters:
        order_id - A string containing the order Id
        refund - A refund object containing information about refund to process
        Returns:
        Refund object containing the processed refund.
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order is not found or there is some issue

      • calculateRefund

        Refund calculateRefund(Long order_id,
                       Refund_Line_Item[] lineItems,
                       Shipping shipping)
                throws ShopifyError
        Calculate refund transactions based on line items and shipping. The returned response can be used to create a Refund. Note that returned transactions are of the kind "suggested refund", which must be changed to refund in order for them to be accepted.
        Parameters:
        order_id - A Long object containing the order ID
        lineItems - Array of line item IDs and quantities to refund
        shipping - Shipping Object specifying how much shipping to refund.
        Returns:
        Refund Object containing the suggested refund.
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order is not found or there is some issue
